ygData.subject: Re: Perl implementation availability?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ben, I do not know of any Perl-based NEAT implementations, so yours would likely be the first.  So it would probably be appreciated by those who prefer Perl.

ikely be the first.  So it would probably be appreciated by

> 
> Is th=
ere a publicly available Perl version of NEAT (or any of the

 If there's some existing code out there, I would probably
